Function shrink_and_rebin

boost::histogram::algorithm::shrink_and_rebin — Shrink and rebin command to be used in reduce.

Synopsis

// In header: <boost/histogram/algorithm/reduce.hpp>


reduce_command shrink_and_rebin(double lower, double upper, unsigned merge);

Description

Command is applied to corresponding axis in order of reduce arguments.

To shrink andrebin in one command (see the respective commands for more details). Equivalent to passing both commands for the same axis toreduce.

Parameters:

lower

lowest bound that should be kept.

merge

how many adjacent bins to merge into one.

upper

highest bound that should be kept. If upper is inside bin interval, the whole interval is removed.
